:KitKat:;

She jumps away from the charge but the concusion from the explosion 
throws her down.  She slowly gets up off the ground.  Her shoulder 
leaking mech fluid heavily, her leg in pain.  She looked at 
Stingtra,"How are you doing Solo?"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Autofire::
> 
> Autofire follows Adrax, looking backwards at the battlefield. He 
throws one 
> final charge at KitKat, and continues to fly after Adrax.
